headline: HBSC downgrades Big Banks: Analyst behind the call explains why
summary: Bank stocks are in focus after HSBC analysts downgraded Bank of America (BAC), JPMorgan (JPM), and Goldman Sachs (GS), citing valuation concerns. HSBC's head of US financials research, Saul Martinez, the analyst behind the note, tells Yahoo Finance why the firm downgraded the Big Bank names and which regional bank plays he prefers. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here.

headline: PNC Bank automates direct deposit switch for customers
summary: The bank worked with Atomic to embed the digital payroll deposit manager into its mobile banking app.

headline: PNC Bank Introduces New Digital Direct Deposit Manager
summary: PNC Bank today announced the launch of a new feature, PNC Direct Deposit, that provides clients with the ability to easily set up direct deposits for payroll, Social Security payments or other regular income, directly from the PNC Mobile app.
